adm:managed-object.name: plugin
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis: provide a mechanism for executing custom code at specified points in operation processing and in the course of other events like connection establishment and termination, server startup and shutdown, and LDIF import and export.

adm:property.name: enabled
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
Indicate whether the
is enabled for use.

adm:property.name: plugin-class
adm:property.adm:synopsis:
The fully-qualified name of the Java class that provides the
implementation.

adm:property.name: plugin-type
adm:property.adm:synopsis: The plugin types, which define the conditions under which this plugin should be invoked.

adm:value.name: startup
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked during the Directory Server startup process.

adm:value.name: shutdown
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked during a graceful Directory Server shutdown.

adm:value.name: postconnect
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked whenever a new connection is established to the server.

adm:value.name: postdisconnect
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked whenever an existing connection is terminated (by either the client or the server).

adm:value.name: ldifimport
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked for each entry read during an LDIF import.

adm:value.name: ldifexport
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked for each operation to be written during an LDIF export.

adm:value.name: preparseabandon
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing an abandon request.

adm:value.name: preparseadd
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing an add request.

adm:value.name: preparsebind
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing a bind request.

adm:value.name: preparsecompare
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing a compare request.

adm:value.name: preparsedelete
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing a delete request.

adm:value.name: preparseextended
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing an extended request.

adm:value.name: preparsemodify
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing a modify request.

adm:value.name: preparsemodifydn
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing a modify DN request.

adm:value.name: preparsesearch
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing a search request.

adm:value.name: preparseunbind
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to parsing an unbind request.

adm:value.name: preoperationadd
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to performing the core add processing.

adm:value.name: preoperationbind
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to performing the core bind processing.

adm:value.name: preoperationcompare
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to performing the core compare processing.

adm:value.name: preoperationdelete
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to performing the core delete processing.

adm:value.name: preoperationextended
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to performing the core extended processing.

adm:value.name: preoperationmodify
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to performing the core modify processing.

adm:value.name: preoperationmodifydn
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to performing the core modify DN processing.

adm:value.name: preoperationsearch
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked prior to performing the core search processing.

adm:value.name: postoperationabandon
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the abandon processing.

adm:value.name: postoperationadd
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the core add processing but before sending the response to the client.

adm:value.name: postoperationbind
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the core bind processing but before sending the response to the client.

adm:value.name: postoperationcompare
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the core compare processing but before sending the response to the client.

adm:value.name: postoperationdelete
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the core delete processing but before sending the response to the client.

adm:value.name: postoperationextended
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the core extended processing but before sending the response to the client.

adm:value.name: postoperationmodify
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the core modify processing but before sending the response to the client.

adm:value.name: postoperationmodifydn
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the core modify DN processing but before sending the response to the client.

adm:value.name: postoperationsearch
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the core search processing but before sending the response to the client.

adm:value.name: postoperationunbind
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after completing the unbind processing.

adm:value.name: postresponseadd
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after sending the add response to the client.

adm:value.name: postresponsebind
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after sending the bind response to the client.

adm:value.name: postresponsecompare
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after sending the compare response to the client.

adm:value.name: postresponsedelete
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after sending the delete response to the client.

adm:value.name: postresponseextended
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after sending the extended response to the client.

adm:value.name: postresponsemodify
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after sending the modify response to the client.

adm:value.name: postresponsemodifydn
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after sending the modify DN response to the client.

adm:value.name: postresponsesearch
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked after sending the search result done message to the client.

adm:value.name: searchresultentry
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked before sending a search result entry to the client.

adm:value.name: searchresultreference
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked before sending a search result reference to the client.

adm:value.name: intermediateresponse
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Invoked before sending an intermediate repsonse message to the client.
